kv10.1:5.1: Upapattesiye pañcakkhandhe aniruddhe kiriyā pañcakkhandhā uppajjantīti?
kv10.1:5.3: Dasannaṃ khandhānaṃ samodhānaṃ hoti, dasa khandhā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchantīti?
kv10.1:5.6: dasannaṃ khandhānaṃ samodhānaṃ hoti, dasa khandhā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchantīti?
kv10.1:6.1: Upapattesiye pañcakkhandhe aniruddhe kiriyā cattāro khandhā uppajjantīti?
kv10.1:6.3: Navannaṃ khandhānaṃ samodhānaṃ hoti, nava khandhā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchantīti?
kv10.1:6.6: navannaṃ khandhānaṃ samodhānaṃ hoti, nava khandhā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchantīti?
kv10.1:7.3: Channaṃ khandhānaṃ samodhānaṃ hoti, cha khandhā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchantīti?
kv10.1:7.6: channaṃ khandhānaṃ samodhānaṃ hoti, cha khandhā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchantīti?
kv10.1:8.3: Mato maggaṃ bhāveti, kālaṅkato maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
